import React from 'react'; import { AutoLinkHeader, Example, Link as PatternflyThemeLink } from 'theme-patternfly-org/components'; import DashboardWrapper from '../../../../node_modules/@patternfly/react-core/src/demos/./examples/DashboardWrapper'; // Toggle currently active tab const handleTabClick = (event, tabIndex) => { setActiveTabKey(tabIndex); }; const tabsBreadcrumb = ( Overview Pods Pod details{' '} ); const tabContent = ( Pod details Name 3scale-control-fccb6ddb9-phyqv9 Status Running Namespace knative-serving-ingress Restart policy Always restart Labels Active deadline seconds Not configured Tolerations stuff Pod IP 10..345.2.197 Annotations stuff Node ip-10-0-233-118.us-east-2.computer.external Created at Oct 15, 1:51 pm ); The content of the drawer really is up to you. It could have form fields, definition lists, text lists, labels, charts, progress bars, etc. Spacing recommendation is 24px margins. You can put tabs in here, and can also make the drawer scrollable.
